title: The Week of Xavier Washington: Teacher of Justice
summary: Xavier Washington, a 53-year-old teacher with a passion for advising, discovers his hidden superpowers and uses them to confront and overcome a mysterious threat to his community, all within the span of one week.
summaryGerman: Xavier Washington, ein 53-jähriger Lehrer mit einer Leidenschaft für Beratung, entdeckt seine verborgenen Superkräfte und setzt sie ein, um innerhalb einer Woche eine mysteriöse Bedrohung für seine Gemeinde zu konfrontieren und zu überwinden.
summaryDutch: Xavier Washington, een 53-jarige leraar met een passie voor adviseren, ontdekt zijn verborgen superkrachten en gebruikt ze om binnen een week een mysterieuze dreiging voor zijn gemeenschap het hoofd te bieden en te overwinnen.
summaryFrench: Xavier Washington, un enseignant de 53 ans passionné par le conseil, découvre ses superpouvoirs cachés et les utilise pour affronter et surmonter une menace mystérieuse pour sa communauté, le tout en l'espace d'une semaine.

story.text: Xavier Washington was grading papers at Jefferson High when he felt a strange tingling in his hands. It wasn't just static; the papers began floating. Surprised but curious, he realized this could be much more than a simple teacher's life.

Empowered by yesterday's discovery, Xavier spent the day experimenting with his newfound abilities, lifting objects with his mind in the seclusion of his garage. He pondered how to use these powers for more than just spectacle.

During a walk, Xavier noticed some thugs harassing an elderly man. He stepped in and, with a subtle gesture, disarmed the aggressors. Realizing the potential of his powers to protect, he felt a rush of purpose.

Having seen the impact he could have, Xavier spoke at a community meeting, advising on peaceful conflict resolution. He shared his belief in using strength for protection, not dominance, leaving the crowd inspired.
Word of his deeds and his mysterious powers spread through town. Whispered stories of a guardian angel began to circulate, and Xavier felt a bond growing between him and those he helped.
Danger struck when a local factory caught fire. Without hesitation, Xavier rushed in, using his abilities to clear debris and guide workers to safety. His acts of heroism were now visible to all.

Resting after a week of heroic acts, Xavier reflected on his journey. He understood now that his gifts were not just for him but for his community. Sitting in his garden, he felt truly at peace, ready for whatever came next.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Xavier Washington knew that his life had transformed forever, now intertwined with the destiny of those he vowed to protect and teach.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility to use it for the good of others.
